summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2009 LEXUS ES350. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE DEALER (HILTON HEAD LEXUS IN HARDEEVILLE, SC) SCHEDULED AN APPOINTMENT AND ORDERED THE PART, BUT THE MANUFACTURER DENIED THE APPROVAL TO RECEIVE THE RECALL PART FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17V006000 (AIR BAGS). THE MANUFACTURER INDICATED THAT THE VEHICLE WAS SOLD IN NEW JERSEY AND NOT SOUTH CAROLINA. THE CONTACT WAS UNCERTAIN AS TO HOW LONG IT WOULD BE BEFORE THE REPAIR WAS RECEIVED FROM THE DEALER. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
